description: Pediatric quality indicators for the hospital account. This table is related to ZC_QI_PEDIATRIC_QUALITY.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: QI_PEDIATRIC_QUAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The pediatric quality indicator category ID for the hospital account.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Accidental Puncture or Laceration Rate


Pressure Ulcer Rate


Retained Surgical Item or Unretrieved Device Fragment Count


Iatrogenic Pneumothorax in Neonates


Iatrogenic Pneumothorax Rate


RACHS-1 Pediatric Heart Surgery Mortality Rate


RACHS-1 Pediatric Heart Surgery Volume


Perioperative Hemorrhage or Hematoma Rate


Postoperative Respiratory Failure Rate


Postoperative Sepsis Rate


Postoperative Wound Dehiscence Rate


Central Venous Catheter-Related Blood Stream Infection Rate


Transfusion Reaction Count


Asthma Admission Rate


Diabetes Short-term Complications Admission Rate


Gastroenteritis Admission Rate


Perforated Appendix Admission Rate


Urinary Tract Infection Admission Rate


Pediatric Safety for Selected Indicators


Pediatric Quality Overall Composite


Pediatric Quality Acute Composite


Pediatric Quality Chronic Composite


Undefined
